verses.verse: יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD מָ֭לָךְ <WH4427> Ma-loch reigneth תָּגֵ֣ל <WH1523> ta-Gel rejoice הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz; let the earth יִ֝שְׂמְח֗וּ <WH8055> yis-me-Chu, be glad אִיִּ֥ים <WH339> 'i-Yim of isles רַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> rab-Bim. let the multitude

עָנָ֣ן <WH6051> 'a-Nan Clouds וַעֲרָפֶ֣ל <WH6205> va-'a-ra-Fel and darkness סְבִיבָ֑יו <WH5439> se-vi-Vav; [are] round about צֶ֥דֶק <WH6664> Tze-dek him righteousness וּ֝מִשְׁפָּ֗ט <WH4941> u-mish-Pat, and judgment מְכ֣וֹן <WH4349> me-Chon [are] the habitation כִּסְאֽוֹ׃ <WH3678> kis-'O. of his throne

אֵ֭שׁ <WH784> 'esh A fire לְפָנָ֣יו <WH6440> le-fa-Nav before תֵּלֵ֑ךְ <WH1980> te-Lech; goes וּתְלַהֵ֖ט <WH3857> u-te-la-Het him and burneth up סָבִ֣יב <WH5439> sa-Viv round about צָרָֽיו׃ <WH6862> tza-Rav. his enemies

הֵאִ֣ירוּ <WH215> he-'I-ru enlightened בְרָקָ֣יו <WH1300> ve-ra-Kav His lightnings תֵּבֵ֑ל <WH8398> te-Vel; the world רָאֲתָ֖ה <WH7200> ra-'a-Tah saw וַתָּחֵ֣ל <WH2342> vat-ta-Chel and trembled הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. the earth

הָרִ֗ים <WH2022> ha-Rim, The hills כַּדּוֹנַ֗ג <WH1749> kad-do-Nag, like wax נָ֭מַסּוּ <WH4549> Na-mas-su melted מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> mil-lif-Nei at the presence יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD מִ֝לִּפְנֵ֗י <WH6440> mil-lif-Nei, at the presence אֲד֣וֹן <WH113> a-Don of the Lord כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- of the whole הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. of the whole earth

הִגִּ֣ידוּ <WH5046> hig-Gi-du declare הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim The heavens צִדְק֑וֹ <WH6664> tzid-Ko; his righteousness וְרָא֖וּ <WH7200> ve-ra-'U see כָל־ <WH3605> chol and all הָעַמִּ֣ים <WH5971> ha-'am-Mim and all the people כְּבוֹדֽוֹ׃ <WH3519> ke-vo-Do. his glory

יֵבֹ֤שׁוּ׀ <WH954> ye-Vo-shu Confounded כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all עֹ֬בְדֵי <WH5647> oe-dei be all they that serve פֶ֗סֶל <WH6459> Fe-sel, graven images הַמִּֽתְהַלְלִ֥ים <WH1984> ham-mit-hal-Lim that boast בָּאֱלִילִ֑ים <WH457> ba-'e-li-Lim; themselves of idols הִשְׁתַּחֲווּ־ <WH7812> hish-ta-cha-vu- worship ל֝וֹ lo כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> E-lo-Him. him all [ye] gods

שָׁמְעָ֬ה <WH8085> sha-me-'Ah heard וַתִּשְׂמַ֨ח׀ <WH8055> vat-tis-Mach and was glad צִיּ֗וֹן <WH6726> tzi-Yon, Zion וַ֭תָּגֵלְנָה <WH1523> Vat-ta-ge-le-nah rejoiced בְּנ֣וֹת <WH1323> be-Not and the daughters יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah; of Judah לְמַ֖עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an Because מִשְׁפָּטֶ֣יךָ <WH4941> mish-pa-Tei-cha because of thy judgments יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. O LORD

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> 'at-Tah You יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh For thou LORD עֶלְי֥וֹן <WH5945> el-Yon [art] high above עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz; all the earth מְאֹ֥ד <WH3966> me-'Od far above נַ֝עֲלֵ֗יתָ <WH5927> na-'a-Lei-ta, thou art exalted עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- above כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> E-lo-Him. all gods

אֹהֲבֵ֥י <WH157> 'o-ha-Vei Ye that love יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD שִׂנְא֫וּ <WH8130> sin-'U hate רָ֥ע <WH7451> ra' evil שֹׁ֭מֵר <WH8104> mer he preserveth נַפְשׁ֣וֹת <WH5315> naf-Shot the souls חֲסִידָ֑יו <WH2623> cha-si-Dav; of his saints מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> mi-Yad them out of the hand רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> re-sha-'Im, of the wicked יַצִּילֵֽם׃ <WH5337> yatz-tzi-Lem. he delivereth

א֭וֹר <WH216> or Light זָרֻ֣עַ <WH2232> za-Ru-a' is sown לַצַּדִּ֑יק <WH6662> latz-tzad-Dik; for the righteous וּֽלְיִשְׁרֵי־ <WH3477> u-le-yish-rei- for the upright לֵ֥ב <WH3820> lev in heart שִׂמְחָֽה׃ <WH8057> sim-Chah. and gladness

שִׂמְח֣וּ <WH8055> sim-Chu Rejoice צַ֭דִּיקִים <WH6662> Tzad-di-kim ye righteous בַּֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; in the LORD וְ֝הוֹד֗וּ <WH3034> ve-ho-Du, and give thanks לְזֵ֣כֶר <WH2143> le-Ze-cher at the remembrance קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH6944> ka-de-Sho. of his holiness
